campaign.name: 25th Anniversary Subathon
campaign.description: Avalonstar.com is turning 25! A month-long celebration starting September 28th, 2025.

milestones.title: Anniversary Edition Ava Reveal
milestones.description: The reveal of a new "Anniversary Edition" Ava!

milestones.title: Pineapple on Pizza
milestones.description: Bryan plays Pineapple on Pizza (It's 10-15min and free on Steam.)

milestones.title: New Standard Emotes
milestones.description: New standard emotes featuring Ava's new design using suggestions you made in the Discord thread!

milestones.title: New Animated Emotes
milestones.description: New animated emotes featuring Ava's new design using suggestions you made in the Discord thread! These will take Aivy substantially more time to finish so they will come in as the celebration rolls on.

milestones.description: Bryan begins a Solo Run of Guild Wars 2.

milestones.description: Bryan plays Cursed Halo 1 (with Will).

milestones.title: Lands of Lore: The Throne of Chaos
milestones.description: Bryan plays Lands of Lore: The Throne of Chaos. (UNFINISHED BUSINESS.) This is a game that scared Bryan off of dungeon crawlers in general in his youth.

milestones.title: 100 DDR Songs
milestones.description: Bryan does 100 DDR Songs (like old times!) Don't worry Bryan will take breaks between songs. This will be over the course of hours, maybe days within the subathon. It might go over. It probably will. This is Bryan's excuse to get back in shape, and will be scheduled after he's moved back into his office.

milestones.title: GRIME Superboss
milestones.description: Bryan challenges the GRIME superboss.

milestones.title: Sekiro Returns
milestones.description: Bryan returns to Sekiro. (UNFINISHED BUSINESS: We will have our revenge Owl!)
